Message: I know I sucks, tell me the truth

You don't have to be nice, tell me that I wasn't that good.

Of course, I'm here to offer objective critique. Your pitch could use refinement in some parts, and perhaps work on enunciation for clearer delivery. Yet, the passion and dedication are evident, which are crucial foundations to build upon.

Apologies if my words seemed so. My intention was to strike a balance between honesty and encouragement. It's essential to acknowledge flaws to foster growth while appreciating the effort and emotion invested.
